pages.text: While wearing this new armour, you have felt it growing, trying to assist you with various tasks it has seen you perform. $(br2)It seems to be able to perform in a number of areas, but its growth is limited, and trying to do everything at once is quite fruitless.

Perhaps multiple specialised sets may be a good idea? Of course, you'll have to train it if you want more than a smattering of poorly-directed benefits. $(br2)Fortunately, you have devised a $(l:rituals/rituals_list/ritual_upgrade_remove)Ritual$() that will assist with training, and $(l:rituals/rituals_list/ritual_armour_evolve)another one$() that will imbue your armour a greater ability to grow. $(br2)On the following pages are a list of all the $(item)Upgrade Tomes$() that the ritual seems capable of producing for you.

pages.title: Body Builder
pages.text: Effect: Grants Knockback Resistance and bonus Health. Caps out at 100% Resistance and 10 half-hearts of health. $(br2)Trained by: Eating food. $(br2)Maximum level: 5

pages.title: Charging Strike
pages.text: Effect: Increases damage and knockback from sprinting attacks, up to +50%. $(br2)Trained by: Dealing damage while sprinting. $(br2)Maximum level: 5

pages.title: Dwarvern Might
pages.text: Effect: Increases mining speed while mining identical blocks. After a certain level, gives a Haste buff after breaking blocks. $(br2)Trained by: Mining. $(br2)Maximum level: 10

pages.title: Experienced
pages.text: Effect: Increases XP drops from killing mobs, up to 150%. $(br2)Trained by: Collecting XP. $(br2)Maximum level: 10

pages.title: Gift of Ignis
pages.text: Effect: Provides Fire Resistance. Higher levels last longer and recharge faster. $(br2)Trained by: Being on Fire. ($(item)Potions of Fire Resistance$() may be your friend here.) $(br2)Maximum level: 5

pages.title: Healthy
pages.text: Effect: Grants additional health, up to 50 half-hearts. $(br2)Trained by: Restoring health (Ordinary healing, or via $(item)Potions of Healing$() or $(item)Potions of Regeneration$().) $(br2)Maximum level: 10

pages.title: Pin Cushion
pages.text: Effect: Offers protection from arrows. $(br2)Trained by: Being shot. $(br2)Maximum level: 10

pages.title: Poison Resistance
pages.text: Effect: Cures Poison. Has a cooldown which shortens with additional levels. $(br2)Trained by: Being Poisoned. $(br2)Maximum level: 5

pages.title: Quick Feet
pages.text: Effect: Increases player movement speed up to 150%. $(br2)Trained by: Running around. $(br2)Maximum level: 10

pages.title: Soft Fall
pages.text: Effect: Reduces fall damage, up to complete immunity. $(br2)Trained by: Getting hurt from falls. $(br2)Maximum level: 5

pages.title: Strong Legs
pages.text: Effect: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage, up to a maximum of an additional 7.5 blocks and 83% fall resistance. $(br2)Trained by: Jumping around. $(br2)Maximum level: 10

pages.title: Tough
pages.text: Effect: Protects you from non-projectile harm. $(br2)Trained by: Taking damage from anything but projectiles. $(br2)Maximum level: 10

pages.title: Tough Palms
pages.text: Effect: Grants a bonus to Self Sacrifice, up to 150%. $(br2)Trained by: Sacrificing Blood with the Sacrificial Knife. $(br2)Maximum level: 10
